mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Post(userID, boardID, companyID, postTitle, postContent) VALUES (#{userID}, #{boardID}, #{companyID}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent});
mapper.select: SELECT post_id as postID, user_id as userID, user_name as userName, board_id as boardID, company_id as companyID, post_title as postTitle, post_content as postContent, post_register_time as postRegisterTime, FROM Post WHERE post_id=#{postID};
